DataSource.RecordSource:
SELECT SO_InvoiceMaster.InvoiceMasterID, SO_InvoiceMaster.InvoiceNo as ConfirmShipNo, SO_InvoiceMaster.ShippedDate, SO_InvoiceDetail.PONumber, SO_InvoiceMaster.ReferenceNo as CustomerPurchaseOrderNo,
MST_Country.Name as LocationCountry, MST_Party.Name AS PartyName, MST_Party.Address AS PartyAddress,
MST_Party.MAPBankAccountNo, Case when CharIndex('#', MST_Party.MAPBankAccountName) > 0 then Substring(MST_Party.MAPBankAccountName, 1, CharIndex('#', MST_Party.MAPBankAccountName) - 1) else MST_Party.MAPBankAccountName End As MAPBankAccountName,
Case when CharIndex('#', MST_Party.MAPBankAccountName) > 0 then Substring(MST_Party.MAPBankAccountName, CharIndex('#', MST_Party.MAPBankAccountName) + 1, Len(MST_Party.MAPBankAccountName)) else '' End As MAPBankAccountAddress,
partyCountry.Name as PartyCountry, CASE WHEN MST_Currency.Code = 'USD' THEN '$' ELSE MST_Currency.Code END AS CurrencySymbol, MST_Currency.Code AS CurrencyCode, ((SELECT SUM( detail.Price * detail.InvoiceQty) FROM SO_InvoiceDetail detail WHERE detail.InvoiceMasterID = SO_InvoiceMaster.InvoiceMasterID AND detail.ProductID = ITM_Product.ProductID ) / ( Case When ( SELECT SUM(detail.InvoiceQty) FROM SO_InvoiceDetail detail WHERE detail.InvoiceMasterID = SO_InvoiceMaster.InvoiceMasterID AND detail.ProductID = ITM_Product.ProductID ) = 0 then 1 else ( SELECT SUM(detail.InvoiceQty) FROM SO_InvoiceDetail detail WHERE detail.InvoiceMasterID = SO_InvoiceMaster.InvoiceMasterID AND detail.ProductID = ITM_Product.ProductID ) end )
) as AVGPrice,
SO_InvoiceMaster.Comment, SO_InvoiceMaster.IssuingBank, SO_InvoiceMaster.OnBoardDate, SO_InvoiceMaster.Measurement, SO_InvoiceMaster.GrossWeight, SO_InvoiceMaster.NetWeight,
SO_InvoiceMaster.LCNo, SO_InvoiceMaster.LCDate,
SO_InvoiceMaster.CNo, SO_InvoiceMaster.VesselName, SO_InvoiceMaster.FromPort, shippingLoc.Description as ShippingLocationName, MST_PaymentTerm.Description as PaymentTerm, MST_PartyContact.Name as PartyContactName, MST_PartyContact.Phone as PartyContactPhone, MST_PartyContact.Fax as PartyContactFax, MST_Carrier.Name as CarrierName,
(SELECT SUM(detail.InvoiceQty) FROM SO_InvoiceDetail detail WHERE detail.InvoiceMasterID = SO_InvoiceMaster.InvoiceMasterID ) as TotalQuantity,
(SELECT SUM( detail.Price * detail.InvoiceQty) FROM SO_InvoiceDetail detail WHERE detail.InvoiceMasterID = SO_InvoiceMaster.InvoiceMasterID ) as TotalAmount,
ITM_Product.ProductID, SO_InvoiceDetail.InvoiceDetailID, SO_CustomerItemRefDetail.CustomerItemCode as PartNo, ITM_Product.Description as PartName, ITM_Product.Revision as PartModel, MST_UnitOfMeasure.Code AS MST_UnitOfMeasureCode, ITM_Category.Name as CategoryName,
ITM_Product.QuantitySet,
(SELECT SUM(detail.InvoiceQty) FROM SO_InvoiceDetail detail WHERE detail.SaleOrderDetailID = SO_SaleOrderDetail.SaleOrderDetailID AND detail.InvoiceMasterID = SO_InvoiceMaster.InvoiceMasterID AND detail.InvoiceDetailID = SO_InvoiceDetail.InvoiceDetailID ) as ShippingQuantity,
SO_InvoiceDetail.Price as UnitPrice,
(SELECT SUM(detail.InvoiceQty) FROM SO_InvoiceDetail detail WHERE detail.InvoiceMasterID = SO_InvoiceMaster.InvoiceMasterID ) * SO_InvoiceDetail.Price AS NetAmount
FROM SO_InvoiceDetail INNER JOIN SO_InvoiceMaster ON SO_InvoiceDetail.InvoiceMasterID = SO_InvoiceMaster.InvoiceMasterID INNER JOIN SO_SaleOrderMaster ON SO_InvoiceMaster.SaleOrderMasterID = SO_SaleOrderMaster.SaleOrderMasterID INNER JOIN SO_SaleOrderDetail ON SO_InvoiceDetail.SaleOrderDetailID = SO_SaleOrderDetail.SaleOrderDetailID INNER JOIN ITM_Product ON ITM_Product.ProductID = SO_SaleOrderDetail.ProductID INNER JOIN MST_UnitOfMeasure ON SO_SaleOrderDetail.SellingUMID = MST_UnitOfMeasure.UnitOfMeasureID INNER JOIN MST_Currency ON SO_InvoiceMaster.CurrencyID = MST_Currency.CurrencyID INNER JOIN MST_Party ON SO_SaleOrderMaster.PartyID = MST_Party.PartyID LEFT JOIN MST_PartyContact ON SO_SaleOrderMaster.PartyContactID = MST_PartyContact.PartyContactID LEFT JOIN MST_Country partyCountry ON partyCountry.CountryID = MST_Party.CountryID LEFT JOIN MST_PaymentTerm ON SO_SaleOrderMaster.PaymentTermsID = MST_PaymentTerm.PaymentTermID LEFT JOIN MST_PartyLocation shippingLoc ON shippingLoc.PartyLocationID = SO_SaleOrderMaster.ShipToLocID LEFT JOIN MST_Country ON shippingLoc.CountryID = MST_Country.CountryID LEFT JOIN ITM_Category ON ITM_Category.CategoryID = ITM_Product.CategoryID LEFT JOIN MST_Carrier ON MST_Carrier.CarrierID = SO_SaleOrderMaster.CarrierID
LEFT JOIN SO_CustomerItemRefMaster ON SO_CustomerItemRefMaster.PartyID = MST_Party.PartyID LEFT JOIN SO_CustomerItemRefDetail ON SO_CustomerItemRefMaster.CustomerItemRefMasterID = SO_CustomerItemRefDetail.CustomerItemRefMasterID AND SO_CustomerItemRefDetail.ProductID = ITM_Product.ProductID
WHERE SO_InvoiceMaster.InvoiceMasterID = 26813
AND (SELECT SUM(detail.InvoiceQty) FROM SO_InvoiceDetail detail WHERE detail.SaleOrderDetailID = SO_SaleOrderDetail.SaleOrderDetailID AND detail.InvoiceMasterID = SO_InvoiceMaster.InvoiceMasterID ) > 0
ORDER BY ITM_Product.Revision, ITM_Product.Description

Field.Name: fldCompany
Field.Text: SHOWA AUTO PART VIET NAM CO., LTD.

Field.Name: fldAddress
Field.Text: Plot M6 Thang Long Industrial Park, Dong Anh, Ha Noi Vietnam

Field.Name: fldFax74
Field.Text: "COMPONENT PARTS FOR PRODUCTION AS PER INVOICE NO.: " & fldInvoiceNo
